SPW3100 - Survey of Spanish Literature I.name: SPW3100 - Survey of Spanish Literature I

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: SPN 3760, SPN 3420 and SPN 3300, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Main literary currents and works from the Middle Ages through the Eighteenth century.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: SPW 3100 or SPW3101 or SPW 3130 or SPW 3131 or C.l.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the drama of the Golden Age, with special emphasis on Lope, Tirso, Alarcon, & Calderon. Controversies of Spanish theatre& its influence abroad are examined.
